name: Tower of Googly
description:
This game was created for the Ludum Dare 50 game jam. The theme of the jam was "Delay the Inevitable", so we decided to go with the inevitable of time running out. To delay the time ending, you collect pigeons to give you a small time boost. Thank you for playing our game!

Credits Design Kylar Black
